QuestData.Title: Prongs and Fangs
QuestData.Description:
Now, $n, do not mistake me- I am a druid. I understand that nature has a balance.
Predators must feed, and others will be hunted. I also understand that tampering with such balance has consequences.
That is why I have taken upon myself to walk this land and perform some... ah... calculations.
Slay only a small number of the wolves you find, and one alpha. That should reduce their number enough to allow the Sablehorn to thrive without disrupting the flow of things here.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you being gentle with your pruning?
QuestData.RewardText: In the end, they will all thrive- for with more Sablehorn, the wolves will eat better in the years to come.
